mapper.sql: ID, COLUMNID, SITEID, SORTID, MAINTITLE, VICETITLE, SUMMARY, KEYWORD, SOURCE, EMPTYCONTENTFLAG, AUTHOR, ARTICLEVERSION, PUBLISHTIME, CREATEDATE, LASTUPDATED, DIRNAME, FILENAME, EDITOR, CREATOR, STATUS, DOCLEVEL, VICEDOCLEVEL, PUBFLAG, AUDITFLAG, SUBSCRIBER, LOCKSTATUS, LOCKEDITOR, AUDITOR, ISPUBLISHED, RELATEDARTID, INDEXFLAG, ISJOINRSS, CLICKNUM, REFERID, MULTIMEDIATYPE, MODELID, ARTICLEPIC, CHANGEPIC, SALEPRICE, INPRICE, MARKETPRICE, VIPPRICE, STOCKNUM, WEIGHT, BRAND, PIC, BIGPIC, SCORE, VOUCHER, URLTYPE, DEFINEURL, NOTEARTICLEID, WORDSNUM, DOWNFILENAME, BEIDATE, SALESNUM, FROMSITEID,SARTICLEID, T1, T2, T3, T4, T5,BILLNO,PK_TRANPROTYPE,PK_TRANPRO,MEDIAFILE,DEPTID, PROCESSOFAUDIT
ID, COLUMNID, SITEID, SORTID, MAINTITLE, VICETITLE, SUMMARY, KEYWORD, SOURCE,mediafilename,createdate,lastupdate
ID, COLUMNID, SITEID, SORTID, MAINTITLE, VICETITLE, SUMMARY, KEYWORD, SOURCE,picname,smallpic1url,smallpic2url,smallpic3url,createdate,lastupdate
mapper.select:
select
from TBL_ARTICLE where COLUMNID = #{COLUMNID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by CREATEDATE desc

select * from (select a.*, ROWNUM RN from( select t.ID, t.COLUMNID, t.SITEID, t.SORTID, t.MAINTITLE, t.VICETITLE, t.SUMMARY, t.KEYWORD, t.SOURCE,t1.mediafilename,t.createdate,t.lastupdate from TBL_ARTICLE t,tbl_multimedia t1 where t1.articleid=t.id and t.COLUMNID = #{COLUMNID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by t.CREATEDATE desc) a) where RN between #{START,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and #{END,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select * from (select a.*, ROWNUM RN from( select t.ID, t.COLUMNID, t.SITEID, t.SORTID, t.MAINTITLE, t.VICETITLE, t.SUMMARY, t.KEYWORD, t.SOURCE,t1.picname,t1.smallpic1url,t1.smallpic2url,t1.smallpic3url,t.createdate,t.lastupdate from TBL_ARTICLE t,tbl_turnpic t1 where t1.articleid=t.id and t.COLUMNID = #{COLUMNID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and (t.status=1 OR t.status=2) AND t.pubflag=0 order by t.CREATEDATE desc) a) where RN between #{START,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and #{END,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count(id) from TBL_ARTICLE where SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and COLUMNID = #{COLUMNID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select wm_concat(id) from tbl_column t CONNECT BY PRIOR t.parentid = id START WITH ID =#{id}
select dirname from tbl_column where id=#{columnid}

select t.id,t.siteid,t.sortid,t.brand,t.pic,t.bigpic,t.columnid , t.articlepic,t.createdate,t.publishtime,tc.dirname,t.filename,t.maintitle,t.summary,t.keyword ,t.content from tbl_article t ,tbl_column tc where t.columnid=tc.id and (t.status =1 or t.status=2 or t.status =5) and t.pubflag =0 and t.siteid = #{siteid} and t.indexflag=0 and rownum < 200
mapper.update: update tbl_article t set indexflag=1 where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select ta.id, ta.maintitle, ta.summary,ta.createdate,ta.dirName,ta.columnid,ta.siteid ,ta.articlepic ,tb.sitename , ta.bigpic from tbl_article ta , tbl_siteinfo tb where ta.siteid=tb.siteid and ta.id =#{id} and (ta.status =1 or ta.status =5) and ta.pubflag =0 and ta.indexflag=0
mapper.delete: delete from TBL_ARTICLE where siteid = #{siteid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and id in (${artids})
mapper.select: select tbl_article_id.NEXTVAL from dual

mapper.select:
select
from TBL_ARTICLE where siteid=5891
and COLUMNID = #{columnId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and maintitle like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
order by createdate desc

select
from TBL_ARTICLE where creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and siteid=5891

SELECT * FROM (SELECT tt.*, ROWNUM AS rowno FROM (SELECT t.id,t.siteid,t.columnid,t.status,t.maintitle,t.pubflag,t.dirname,t.summary,t.pic,t.createdate FROM tbl_article t where deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and siteid=#{siteid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY createdate DESC) tt WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ENDROW,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) table_alias WHERE table_alias.rowno > #{BEGINROW,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select count(id) from TBL_ARTICLE where deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and siteid=#{siteid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and maintitle like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') and status=#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and pubflag=#{pubflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and auditflag=#{auditflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
